pyramid selling.translation[0].definitio: a business activity in which the main income comes from people who buy the right to sell products, rather than from the sale of the products themselves. Pyramid selling is illegal in many places.
pyramid selling.translation[1].definitio: a business activity where the main income is from people who pay to sell products, rather than from sales of products themselves. Pyramid selling is illegal in many places
Pyramid selling is concerned with marketing goods or services through a chain of private distributors.
